messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] All that schooling.....
messages.messageBody:
<" She went on a rant last week on the phone, for about 20 minutes, about
how I'm
ruining my son (he's 10) by not 'schooling' him "

And you LET her!!??;)>

Yeah.<sheepishly hanging head>. I could hardly respond. She just went on &
on. She'd occasionally ask a question, "So does he (ds) just play video
games all day?" or "He's so smart. And he won't even know how to cope
with real life?" (since I'm not schooling him), blah blah blah.



I was in Phoenix with dh, driving to a dance, so once we got there & by the
door with the music blaring, I said something like "well, we just got to our
dance workshop, gotta go!" and hung up. I was on the phone with her last
week and she didn't mention it. She was wondering what our Christmas plans
were. As if we'd come to visit!





heather



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
